eu.stratosphere.nephele.protocols

Interface JobManagementProtocol

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RPCProtocol

    public interface JobManagementProtocol
extends RPCProtocol
    The JobManagementProtocol specifies methods required to manage Nephele jobs from a job client.
    Author:
    warneke

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JobCancelResult cancelJob(JobID jobID)
      Requests to cancel the job specified by the given ID.
      JobProgressResult getJobProgress(JobID jobID, long minimumSequenceNumber)
      Retrieves the current status of the job specified by the given ID.
      int getRecommendedPollingInterval()
      Returns the recommended interval in seconds in which a client is supposed to poll for progress information.
      JobSubmissionResult submitJob(JobGraph job)
      Submits the specified job to the job manager.

    • Method Detail

      • submitJob

        JobSubmissionResult submitJob(JobGraph job)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Submits the specified job to the job manager.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to be executed
        Returns:
        a protocol of the job submission including the success status
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurred while transmitting the submit request
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the caller is interrupted while waiting for the response of the remote procedure call

      • getJobProgress

        JobProgressResult getJobProgress(JobID jobID,
                                 long minimumSequenceNumber)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        Retrieves the current status of the job specified by the given ID. Consecutive calls of this method may result in duplicate events. The caller must take care of this.
        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID of the job
        minimumSequenceNumber - the minimum sequence number of the events to get
        Returns:
        a JobProgressResult object including the current job progress
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurred while transmitting the request
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the caller is interrupted while waiting for the response of the remote procedure call

      • cancelJob

        JobCancelResult cancelJob(JobID jobID)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Requests to cancel the job specified by the given ID.
        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID of the job
        Returns:
        a JobCancelResult containing the result of the cancel request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurred while transmitting the request
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the caller is interrupted while waiting for the response of the remote procedure call

      • getRecommendedPollingInterval

        int getRecommendedPollingInterval()
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns the recommended interval in seconds in which a client is supposed to poll for progress information.
        Returns:
        the interval in seconds
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurred while transmitting the request
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the caller is interrupted while waiting for the response of the remote procedure call
